Name: Danger Crew
About the game: Danger Crew is a retro-style RPG about being a programmer at a company. In Danger Crew, you will: Bust out your laptop in hack battles against other programmers Level up your Crew with new scripts, laptop upgrades, and computer science themed items Complete journal quests by helping people at the office and in the city solve big problems A full 7 chapter single player story experience Original soundtrack created by the developers and friends What's the gameplay like? A mashup of Earthbound, Super Mario RPG, and Pokemon. How long does Danger Crew take to complete? On average, people finish the story in 6-7 hours. Reviewers and Streamers say: “Danger Crew has to be one of the more refreshing takes on an old school genre I've played in quite some time.” - PiroTae “the graphical style is a nostalgic homage to quirky Super Nintendo RPGs like Earthbound & Robotrek“ - devon.dale1 “If you like charming games like Stardew Valley, then you will enjoy this one as well!” - Rummy
